story_teamflare_02_15000/2401_1001_0100_:
That is all for the results of the
infiltration mission.
story_teamflare_02_15000/2401_1001_0200_:
The brilliant scientists from Team Flare have
helped us.
story_teamflare_02_15000/2401_1001_0300_: Let’s get them to work right away...
story_teamflare_02_15000/2401_1001_0400_:
We’ve made progress by analyzing the research
materials we stole, and our organization is gaining
more and more power.
story_teamflare_02_15000/2401_1001_0500_: Well done. I’m happy with these results.
story_teamflare_02_15000/2401_1001_0600_: Yes, sir! Thank you very much!
story_teamflare_02_15000/2401_1001_0700_:
We were never interested in a short-lived weapon
of destruction anyway.
story_teamflare_02_15000/2401_1001_0800_: It seems no one has noticed our true goal.
